column5: We are now accepting applications for the Management (Business Analytics) course for January 2022. Please visit our website for more information.Are you interested in a career in the dynamic data driven business world? Major organisations use data and analytics to inform their strategic and operational decisions. Highly skilled analysts are in great demand across all sectors, from finance, education, pharmaceuticals and government, with job opportunities available around the world.
column7: Please visit our website for the Management (Business Analytics) course fee information.
